title: Lion from the Atlas Mountains
provenance_text:
The F. H. Bresler Co., Milwaukee, WI [1]; sold to  Kenneth Seaver [1877-1969], Pittsburgh, PA and Oakmont, PA on February 20, 1926 until June 4, 1927 [2]; his gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, June 1947.

Notes:
[1]. Located at 423 Milwaukee Street in Milwaukee.
[2]. This work and "Royal Tiger" (47.11.8) were purchased for $400; see original invoice in curatorial file.

creator.death_place: Paris (Ville de Paris department, Île-de-France, France)
